The Science & Story Behind It

This mix captures the essence of a cornerstone of Japanese cuisine in its most potent form:

  • The distinctive aroma of shiso comes from perillaldehyde, a compound unique to this genus, which provides the complex cinnamon-anise flavour that is irreplaceable in Japanese cooking.
  • Red shiso’s colour comes from a pigment called shisonin, which not only provides its brilliant hue but also has documented antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, making the herb as healthy as it is beautiful.
  • By harvesting at the micro-leaf stage, the plant’s secondary metabolites - the compounds responsible for its unique flavour and colour - are at their peak concentration, delivering a more intense experience than mature leaves.

In short, the Micro-Shiso Mix is a concentrated essence of Japan, a powerful duo of aromatic micro-greens that delivers a lifetime of flavour in a single, prolific cut, bringing the authentic, complex taste of a Tokyo sushi bar directly to your balcony.
